text: she was once celebrated as the Shirley
Temple of the animal world and millions
of children in New York City grew up
with her her name was patty cake and she
was the first gorilla born in New York
she died on Sunday at the Bronx Zoo at
the age of 40 patty cake was born on
September 3rd 1972 at the Central Park
Zoo and she was an instant star when she
was 6 months old and broke her right arm
the city held its breath as patty cake
underwent an hour-long operation during
the 1970s when New York teetered on the
brink of bankruptcy and crime was rising
patty cake charm New Yorkers with her
sweet antics she eventually ended up at
the Bronx Zoo where she gave birth to
ten infants including twins born in 1995
today her offspring live in zoos across
the country
you
